item.title: Trump has signed more executive orders in 2025 than in his entire first term
item.description: One third of Trump’s executive orders have been explicitly challenged in court, a Post analysis of data from nonprofits CourtListener and JustSecurity...

item.title: Some Republican lawmakers call for mass expulsion of American Muslims

item.title: U.S. offers Ukraine security guarantee in bid to strike peace deal
item.description: Ukrainian leaders said Monday they appreciated White House efforts to reach a deal even as significant gaps appeared to remain between the sides.

item.title: Trump attack on Rob Reiner tests the limits, even for his MAGA base
item.description: The president accused the Hollywood director, who was stabbed to death along with his wife, of having “Trump derangement syndrome.”
